Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Javelin head
Description: Javelin head, very similar to spearheads but different in size and width. The tang is 6,4 cm long and its width varies between 3,3 cm and 2,8 cm, a characteristic that puts this object in the category of javelin heads.  Its maximum thickness of 1,7 cm is thicker than certain other javelin heads.
